faqDataP.Q1: What payment methods do you accept?
faqDataP.R1: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), PayPal, and gift cards.
faqDataP.R2: Yes, all transactions are protected by SSL encryption and verified by banking systems.
faqDataP.R3: We offer payment in 3 installments with no fees through our financial partner.
faqDataP.Q4: How can I use a promo code or gift card?
faqDataP.R4: You can enter your promo code or gift card number during checkout before confirming your order.

faqDataC.Q1: How do I place an order?
faqDataC.R1: Add your products to the cart, validate your cart, and follow the steps for payment and delivery.
faqDataC.Q2: Can I modify or cancel my order?
faqDataC.R2: Yes, as long as your order has not been shipped, you can modify or cancel it from your customer account.
faqDataC.Q3: How do I know if my order is confirmed?
faqDataC.R3: You will receive a confirmation email with the summary of your order.
faqDataC.Q4: Can I order without creating an account?
faqDataC.R4: Yes, you can order as a guest, but we recommend creating an account to track your orders.

faqDataL.R1: Standard delivery takes 2 to 5 business days. An express option is available within 24/48 hours.
faqDataL.R2: Yes, we deliver to most countries. Delivery times and fees vary depending on the destination.
faqDataL.R3: Shipping fees are automatically calculated at checkout based on weight and destination.
faqDataL.Q4: How can I track my order?
faqDataL.R4: A tracking number will be sent to you by email once your package has been shipped.

faqDataR.Q1: Can I return a perfume if I donâ€™t like it?
faqDataR.R1: Yes, you have 14 days after receiving your order to return it, provided the product is intact and unopened.
faqDataR.Q2: How do I make a return or exchange?
faqDataR.R2: Log in to your customer account, select the relevant order, and follow the return instructions.
faqDataR.Q3: Are return shipping costs my responsibility?
faqDataR.R3: Return shipping is free if the product is defective or incorrect. Otherwise, the costs are your responsibility.
faqDataR.Q4: When will I be refunded after a return?
faqDataR.R4: Refunds are processed within 7 business days after receiving and checking the returned product.
